casebody.data:
RICE & ADAMS CORPORATION, Appellant, v. Harry D. LATHROP, Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 20, 1928. No. 160. See, also, 6 F.(2d) 91. Mitchell & Staples, of Buffalo, N. Y., for appellant. Joshua R. H. Potts, of Chicago, Ill., Eugene V. Clarke, of New York City, and John S. Powers, of Buffalo, N. Y. (Helen T. West and Homer' M. Hartford, both of Philadelphia, Pa., of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (21 F.[2d] 124) affirmed, with costs.
